Question
========

Below is a portion of an ANOVA table belonging to a CRD ANOVA.

  --------------- ---- ---- ---- --- Source of variation df SS MS F Among groups 3 42 Within groups 12 Total 78 --------------- ---- ---- ---- ---

In this ANOVA table, what is the value of the test size to test test equality of group averages?

Answerlist
----------

* 2.69
* 14
* 4.67
* 1.17

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.69: Incorrect
* 14: Incorrect
* 4.67: Correct
* 1.17: Incorrect
